price: Rabbii achitti gabbaramtoota godhatan Akka humnaafi kabajaa isaaniif ta’aniif jecha.
arabic: وَٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ءَالِهَةٗ لِّيَكُونُواْ لَهُمۡ عِزّٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-ittakhadhū min dūni al-lahi ālihatan liyakūnū lahum ʿizzan
